name: MythWeavers - Reweaved 0
description:
Myth Weavers with colours similar to the original background images - instead of the background images.
And a post Editor that fits into MW's browns&beiges instead of being grey&white.
additional_info:
Style is for Mozilla, Chrome users need to kill the "@-moz-document" declaration and its curled brackets around the code to make it work.

Might be followed up by Reweaves in other colours or more elaborate changes if there's interest.
I might eventually build a Matrix-based userstyle for cyberpunkish games (black-green with image backgrounds and changed font colours to go with it - I'm not sure if I could somehow change the MW logo by CSS alone, for background-image is about the only image you can get at with CSS).

Update 01: Fooling around with CSS gradients.
Update 02: Changed Gradients; New: rounded edges for a neater look
Update 03: More - and less - rounded edges, more gradients. I am satisfied ...for now.
